name: @perspect3vism/file-storage
description: An AD4M Language for file storage leveraging a holochain DNA

scripts.integration-test: node ../../test-runner/build/cli.js --test ./integration.test.cjs --bundle ./build/bundle.js --meta '{"name":"file-storage","description":"An AD4M Language for file storage leveraging a holochain DNA","sourceCodeLink":"https://github.com/perspect3vism/file-storage-language","possibleTemplateParams":["uid","name"]}'
scripts.build:linux: yarn run build-icons && yarn run build-dna && tsc && rollup -c
scripts.build:macos: yarn run build-icons && yarn run build-dna && tsc && rollup -c
scripts.build:windows: yarn run build-icons && cd hc-dna && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./build.ps1 && cd .. && tsc && rollup -c
